mapper.insert: insert into PHOIBE_BROWSE (ID, USER_ID, DOCUMENT_ID, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{documentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into PHOIBE_BROWSE
ID,
USER_ID,
DOCUMENT_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{documentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update PHOIBE_BROWSE
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.delete: delete from PHOIBE_BROWSE where ID in (select t.id from (SELECT a.ID id,rownum rno FROM ( select ID from PHOIBE_BROWSE where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME desc ) a ) t WHERE t.rno > 50)
